data.name: Alternator: Tactical Stealth Operations
data.detailed_description:
It's an unique era; an era where computation and size of storage is no longer the limitation. The world is mechanical to quantum.

Microbes control microchips, bacteria drives electricity. The world is cyclic and never ending. You are to experience the test of Brahman, who you can meet only if you make it till the end.

KEY FEATURES



  • Vast Environments: The game world takes you through forests, snow, deserts and buildings like robotics lab.
  • Game Mechanics: Solve mysteries, hunt animals, hack machines, avoid traps. The world is mechanical to quantum.
  • Unique Bosses: Each boss is a concept of its own. Each boss has its own mechanics which must be figured out to be defeated.
data.about_the_game:
It's an unique era; an era where computation and size of storage is no longer the limitation. The world is mechanical to quantum.

Microbes control microchips, bacteria drives electricity. The world is cyclic and never ending. You are to experience the test of Brahman, who you can meet only if you make it till the end.

  • Unique Bosses: Each boss is a concept of its own. Each boss has its own mechanics which must be figured out to be defeated.
data.short_description: An action based tactical stealth game set in a high-tech era where computation, speed, & size of storage is no longer the limitation. The world is mechanical to quantum.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7- 64 Bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 | AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 460 | Radeon HD 5770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7- 64 Bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 | AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 4GB/AMD Radeon R9 290 4GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Targeting 1080p, 2xAA, 30 FPS

content_descriptors.notes: Contains non-blood deaths of enemies such as animals, humans, etc
